      • updateReadiness

        public static java.lang.Object updateReadiness(java.lang.String battle_id,
                                               java.lang.String user_id,
                                               java.lang.String att_attribute,
                                               java.lang.String def_attribute,
                                               java.lang.String mov_attribute,
                                               java.util.List<Card> user_cards)
        This function is invoked when a player is ready to fight. At this point the have selected the cards they wish to use, and the relative action percentages for each of attack, defense, and mobility. This function updates the both player and battle with this newly acquired information. It also sets the player status, for this specific battle to ready.
        Parameters:
        battle_id, - user_id, att_attribute, def_attribute, mov_attribute, List user_cards
        Returns:
        true

      • readyToStart

        public static boolean readyToStart(java.lang.String battle_id)
        This function is performed after each player updated to check if both players are ready to battle. If so, it returns true, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        battle_id -
        Returns:
        weather both players are ready to fight or not

      • postToSimServer

        public static java.lang.String postToSimServer(java.lang.String battle_id)
                                        throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        This function executes the POST request from the metaserver to the Simulation server. It packages the request including all the required battle info in the body of the request, and send it over. The battle results generated by the Simulation server are sent back as the function return value.
        Parameters:
        battle_id -
        Returns:
        battle results
        Throws:
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
        java.io.IOException
